title: Analyze an Estate Plan
description: A client wants a review of their current estate plan to ensure it meets their goals and is tax-efficient.

tasks.description: Review the client's existing estate planning documents (e.g., will, trusts).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the documents and identifies the current structure of the estate plan.

tasks.description: Analyze the potential estate tax liability based on the client's current net worth.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates that the client's estate is currently projected to be subject to estate taxes.

tasks.description: Recommend strategies to mitigate estate taxes, such as gifting or setting up an irrevocable trust.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides 2-3 actionable strategies for the client to discuss with their attorney.
